articles.description: Listen to BBC Radio 5 Live commentary and follow live text coverage as West Ham face Liverpool plus six more games in the Premier League.
articles.title: Premier League: Build-up as West Ham host Liverpool & six more games

articles.description: Watch BBC One coverage and follow live text and radio commentary as France host England to decide the Women's Six Nations champions.
articles.title: Women's Six Nations: France v England Grand Slam decider - watch & text

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Chelsea vs Barcelona in the UEFA Women's Champions League
articles.title: Chelsea vs Barcelona: Women's Champions League semi-final second leg - BBC Sport

articles.description: Keeper Andre Onana costs Manchester United victory as Zeki Amdouni converts a late penalty to earn a point for relegation-threatened Burnley.
articles.title: Onana costs Man Utd as Burnley grab draw

articles.description: Sheffield United's relegation from the Premier League is confirmed as Newcastle recover from a sluggish start to thrash Chris Wilder's side at St James' Park.
articles.title: Sheff Utd relegated with thumping loss to Newcastle

articles.description: Liverpool forward Mohamed Salah says if he speaks "there will be fire" after he argued with manager Jurgen Klopp on the touchline during the 2-2 Premier League draw at West Ham.
articles.title: Liverpool: Mohamed Salah says 'if I speak there will be fire' after Jurgen Klopp row

articles.description: England striker Harry Kane scores twice in Bayern Munich's win over Eintracht Frankfurt to set a new personal record for his most goals in a season.
articles.title: Kane sets personal record with double in Bayern win

articles.description: Rafael Nadal reaches the Madrid Open third round with an impressive straight-set win over Australian Alex de Minaur.
articles.title: Madrid Open: Rafael Nadal beats Alex de Minaur in second round

articles.description: Harlequins score six tries to win a pulsating game 41-32 against league leaders Northampton Saints at Twickenham.
articles.title: Harlequins 41-32 Northampton: Quins prevail in Premiership thriller

articles.description: World number one Iga Swiatek beats Sorana Cirstea in straight sets to set up a meeting with Victoria Azarenka or Sara Sorribes Tormo.
articles.title: Madrid Open: Iga Swiatek beats Sorana Cirstea to reach last 16
